titles.title: A bill for the relief of Reynaldo B. Nidoy and Bella Anderson Nidoy.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 3/18/1987--Introduced. Declares two named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
